overview: When gangster Jimmy Donovan is made guardian of Midge, the 7-year-old brother of his friend Big Ben Murray, he decides to reform and rear Midge properly. The court takes custody of Midge, but Donovan proves himself by recovering a payroll stolen by some of his ex-colleagues, thereby winning Midge and Kitty, his girl.
tagline: HERE'S A PICTURE WITH A BIG THEME THAT DIGS INTO YOUR SOUL
title: Big Brother
